mapper.select: select as_key1 ,as_key2 ,as_date ,as_model ,as_color ,as_suri ,as_yumu ,as_memo ,as_gongjang ,as_acorp ,as_acorp1 ,as_acorp2 ,as_acorp3 ,as_computer ,as_damdang ,as_memo2 ,as_memo3 ,as_aname ,B.com_REM1 as as_comrem ,as_key4 ,Left(as_date2,10) as as_date2 ,as_memo3 ,as_devflag ,as_devcode ,unsongnum ,misdate ,misnum ,misflag , CONVERT(CHAR(19),as_devdate,20) as as_devdate from as_jupsu WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN TB_CA510 B ON com_code <> '00' and com_cls = '002' and com_code=as_jupsu.as_aname WHERE as_acorp1 + CAST(as_acorp2 as varchar) Like concat('%',#{ascode},'%') and as_key1 between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(as_devflag,'') Like concat('%',#{as_devflag},'%') ORDER BY as_key1 desc, as_key2

select as_key1 ,as_key2 ,as_date ,as_model ,as_color ,as_suri ,as_yumu ,as_memo ,as_gongjang ,as_acorp ,as_acorp1 ,as_acorp2 ,as_acorp3 ,as_computer ,as_damdang ,as_memo2 ,trim(as_aname) as as_name ,B.com_REM1 as as_comrem ,as_key4 ,Left(as_date2,10) as as_date2 ,as_memo3 ,as_devflag ,as_devcode ,unsongnum ,misdate ,misnum ,misflag , CONVERT(CHAR(19),as_devdate,20) as as_devdate from as_jupsu WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN TB_CA510 B ON com_code <> '00' and com_cls = '002' and com_code=as_jupsu.as_aname WHERE as_acorp1 + CAST(as_acorp2 as varchar) Like concat('%',#{ascode},'%') and as_key1 between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(as_devflag,'0') Like concat('%',#{as_devflag},'%') ORDER BY as_key1 desc, as_key2
